channel.title: Raku on The Weekly Challenge - Perl & Raku
channel.description: Recent content in Raku on The Weekly Challenge - Perl & Raku

item.title: Advent Calendar 2023
item.description: | 2019 | 2020 | 2021 | 2022 | 2023 | Welcome to our 5th Advent Calendar. We have had enormous amount of blog post shared by Team PWC members. In this edition of Advent Calendar, we are going to pick some of the best creative work by the expert members of Team PWC. MON

item.title: RECAP - The Weekly Challenge - 245
item.description: TABLE OF CONTENTS 01. HEADLINES 02. STAR CONTRIBUTORS 03. CONTRIBUTION STATS 04. GUESTS 05. LANGUAGES 06. CENTURION CLUB 07. DAMIAN CONWAY’s CORNER 08. ANDREW SHITOV’s CORNER 09. PERL SOLUTIONS 10. RAKU SOLUTIONS 11. PERL & RAKU SOLUTIONS HEADLINES Thank you Team PWC for your continuous support and encouragement. STAR CONTRIBUTORS Following members shared solutions to both tasks in Perl and Raku as well as blogged about it.

item.title: The Weekly Challenge - 246
item.description: TABLE OF CONTENTS 01. HEADLINES 02. SPONSOR 03. RECAP 04. PERL REVIEW 05. RAKU REVIEW 06. CHART 07. NEW MEMBERS 08. GUESTS 09. TASK #1: 6 out of 49 10. TASK #2: Linear Recurrence of Second Order HEADLINES Welcome to the Week #246 of The Weekly Challenge. Today is the first monday of the month and time to declare next champion. With great pleasure, I would like to announce, Peter Meszaros as the next champion of the weekly challenge.

item.title: Advent Calendar - December 1, 2023
item.description: Advent Calendar 2023 | Day 1 | Day 2 | The gift is presented by Laurent Rosenfeld. Today he is talking about his solution to The Weekly Challenge - 205. This is re-produced for Advent Calendar 2023 from the original post. Task #1: Third Highest You are given an array of integers. Write a script to find out the Third Highest if found otherwise return the maximum. Example 1 Input: @array = (5,3,4) Output: 3 First highest is 5.

It is the top most loved programming language after Perl and Raku.

item.title: The Weekly Challenge - 244
item.description: TABLE OF CONTENTS 01. HEADLINES 02. SPONSOR 03. RECAP 04. PERL REVIEW 05. RAKU REVIEW 06. CHART 07. NEW MEMBERS 08. GUESTS 09. TASK #1: Count Smaller 10. TASK #2: Group Hero HEADLINES Welcome to the Week #244 of The Weekly Challenge. Just a gentle reminder that we would be preparing Advent Calendar 2023 very soon. If you want any of your past blog to be part of this year Advent Calendar then please do share your blog post link to perlweeklychallenge@yahoo.

item.title: The Weekly Challenge - 243
item.description: TABLE OF CONTENTS 01. HEADLINES 02. SPONSOR 03. RECAP 04. PERL REVIEW 05. RAKU REVIEW 06. CHART 07. NEW MEMBERS 08. GUESTS 09. TASK #1: Reverse Pairs 10. TASK #2: Floor Sum HEADLINES Welcome to the Week #243 of The Weekly Challenge. Let us all welcome two new members to Team PWC i.e. Robert McIntosh and Nelo Tovar. We received the first blog post by Robert McIntosh. Nelo Tovar shared his first contributions to the Task #1 and Task #2 in Perl.
